page.title: 05Housing.
page.content: A survey of a sample of the different types of dwelling houses showed the following approximate proportions. Detached,1/8; Semi-detached,1/2; Terraced,1/4; Bungalow or other, 1/8. More than half the properties are owner-occupied. About one-tenth of houses date back to the turn of the Century, but most of the building developments occurred in the years following the end of the two World Wars.Nearly half of all the properties were built after World War Two.Over 90 % of all buildings are brick-built. It is normal to find dwelling houses with both front and rear gardens.
